title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 15 beta - new build available
description:
In this video we will have a look at the 5thbeta build of Sim Update 15. Most fixes are there again for the Garmin G3x touch. In addition to this fixes some smaller fixes are added the the GNS navigation systems as well as some other parts of the sim.
